name: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
summary: Uncover the truth and delve into a 2D sidescrolling adventure featuring gorgeous art and environments. Then, battle the kaiju in fast-paced, top-down combat. Customize the Sentinels with an arsenal of mechsuit weaponry, and fight to defend humanity!

name: 1337 Ship Deathmatch
summary: 1337 Ship Deathmatch is a simple space shooter game which focuses on multiplayer combat. The player takes control of one of the four ships and the goal is simple. Destroy the others to rack up the points and win the game. The ship has an energy meter for the weapon, so if you shoot too much you need to recharge for a while to get the firing rate back up. There are also two type of warp drives which makes the ship appear in a different location on the screen as well as a shield that absorbs some of the damage when used. The player has the option of either playing against human players or up to four bots, which are set to learn from the player's style of play and adapt to it to increase the difficulty over time.

name: 13-Sai no Hello Work
summary: In 13-Sai no Hello Work, you play a 13 year old robot girl from the future and try out a number of different jobs.

Simple,fun, addictive. And extremely challenging!
Tap and merge colourful squares to reach 13.

Match same coloured tiles to get higher numbers.
Only 0.01% of players can achieve to 13. Can you?

name: 1313 : Puzzle Game
summary: Drop the shapes onto the grid to form straight lines of 13 blocks in this puzzle game. Form lines to score points and to keep the blocks from filling up the grid. The more blocks of the same color, the higher your score!

name: 13 Minutes of Light
summary: When your girlfriend gets on the Virgin Commercial spaceflight to start her career as a teacher at Mars University, you realise the relationship has... a bit of a challenge. Will your penmanship be enough to keep the relationship warm?

name: 13 Letters: Deluxe Edition
summary: Welcome to 13 Letters, every choice you make will impact your personal story!

name: 13 Cycles
summary: Chaos! Freedom! Run on ceilings, customize bizzare spells, shape a square planet that changes every cycle. Its core is for the taking.

name: 1337D00m
summary: 1337d00m is a hacker's version of the original DOOM.

name: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim - Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
Special Box, Secret File Art Book (132-page)
Mech Paper Craft Model Kit
DLC: PS4 Original Theme & Avatar Set

name: 13 Puzzle Rooms
summary: 13 Puzzle Rooms is a puzzle, point-and-click, and room escape game all rolled into one. Explore each room thoroughly, find items to help you solve the puzzles and uncover the mysteries that'll lead to your escape. Brilliant brainteasers will have you hooked but that makes it all the more satisfying to complete.

In the dim, abandoned halls of the school, there are monsters - monsters with names like Guilt and Dysphoria, Insomnia and the Expectations that you can't seem to clear. With no clear way to leave, no way to get rid of the monsters, and no one to help, things are looking pretty bleak. The Anxiety that accompanies you sure seems to think so. 
 
But remember, even in the darkest of places, you can't let your hope die. It's okay to get hurt, and it's okay to fall. And, most importantly: never give up.

name: 1378km
summary: 1378 (km) is a first-person shooter multiplayer video game developed by Jens M. Stober aka ELORX, a student at the Karlsruhe University of Arts and Design. The title refers to the length in kilometres of the Inner German border between East and West Germany from 1949 to 1990, then known as the "death strip". It allows players, up to 16 people at the same time, to take the role of either East Germans trying to cross the border or East German border guards shooting anyone attempting to do so. The game was scheduled to be officially released on October 3 (the anniversary of German reunification) 2010, but was delayed due to its controversy. The game was released in December 2010 following "a public discussion with distinguished guests" at the Karlsruhe University, and will have an age rating of 18+.

name: 13 Wood St
summary: 13 Wood St is a story-based horror game with both psychological and jumpscare elements.

name: 13 Jellyfish
summary: Made for Ludum Dare 37

name: 13: Origin
summary: The Room-like atmospheric puzzle game

name: 13 Laurel Road
summary: A game about places and the memories they hold.

name: 13 Gates
summary: Short first person dodge 'em up adventure through 13 surreal levels.

name: 13's
summary: A fun number matching puzzler that'll keep you hooked for days!

name: 13: Origin - Chapter One
summary: Unknowingly revealing a great secret about human history, will Edmond be able to live with this secret? 13:ORIGIN is a story-based adventure and puzzle game full of suspense and excitement, where you can progress by solving puzzles. Here is the first chapter of the journey.

name: 13 Page
summary: 13 Page is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The player starts as Akatsuki, a girl unable to leave her room. Her goal is to explore the dream world and collect all 13 effects. There is a notebook on the desk in Akatsuki's dream room the player can interact with that shows sketches of all the effects the player collects throughout the game. Hanatsuki, the other player character, is unlocked after completing certain tasks in Akatsuki's dreams.

name: 13 Wood St Remastered
summary: 13 Wood St, a night in October: a long road, a dark forest and the house mentioned in the last will, making you the owner of a mysterious property. Welcome to 13 Wood St, a story rich horror game! Remastered 2022.

name: 13 Steps
summary: Find a way out in this horror/time loop Game. Hide, run, and uncover the mysteries of the "EOS Complex" as you are pursued by the automated security bots gone rogue. They only move when you do, so tread carefully, every step could be your last.

name: 1387: MMO Strategy
summary: 1387 is a text based free-to-play MMO strategy game that is inspired by 2010's social media games. Manage your resources, train your army and found alliances or attack to other players.

name: 13 Candles
summary: 13 Candles is an atmospheric horror game where you play as Sara, 13 year old girl who wakes up in an abandoned hospital. Find your way to the light switch and wake up from your nightmare.

name: 13 Thieves
summary: The devious smash hit puzzle game!

name: 137E0 Action 1 Steak
summary: A joke rom hack made for the Sonic Hacking Contest 2016.

name: 13iew
summary: A girl abandoned in the basement of a hospital for some reason. Escape the hospital avoiding the doctor who abandoned the girl in the basement! Complete the story through hidden foreshadowings and various devices throughout the map and find out why the doctor abandoned the girl in the basement.

name: 13 Playing Cards of Demon
summary: This is a strategy game. Collect and use demon‘s poker skills (similar to Texas Poker rules), regular card skills, abilities, and equipment to defeat enemies.

name: 13 Rosas
summary:
A first-person horror adventure game for Android.

A virtual memorial for the lack of physical ones.

A reminder of the disgusting spirit of the assassins. See how ravenous they become when they fear our freedom.

Dedicated to the forgotten ones on the side of my country's roads. And to the thirteen women. Executed to give example, they became an unspoken symbol for everything that is worth fighting for.

¡Viva la República!

name: 13 Seconds
summary: [13 Seconds] is a hardcore bullet hell roguelike game.Use both hands to control two robots at the same time and fight your way through a barrage of bullets and death rays from merciless machines of destruction!Will you be able to reach the ultimate level 13?

name: 13 Floors: Anomalies
summary: You get a strange job. Your job is to patrol a 13th-floor apartment, look for anomalies...

name: 13Z
summary: Embark on a quest to become the 13th Zodiac in this frantic hack-and-slash roguelike action adventure. Take on a celestial trial of grit, speed and power, and rise stronger after each fall as you upgrade your skills. Your trial awaits!

name: 13F
summary: You are a tired office worker who has been working overtime until late at night due to a heavy workload and is trapped in a strange office building. You have to get to the first floor quickly and go home to rest, because you have to go to work tomorrow morning!

name: 13th Friday Night: Funk Blood
summary: Boyfriend and Girlfriend have decided to join up few campers for a camping trip, while hanging out by themselves they decided to have some fun, but unknown to them they have entered the forbidden territory and their presence has reawakened the dormant killer.

name: 13th House on Halloween
summary:
You finally bought a house, but it's the 13th house on the street and it's Halloween... so who knows what you actually bought...

Are you ready to experience why is it a bad idea to go against superstition on Halloween? In this game you will get to and see the consequences, and maybe even live trough it... but who knows, anything can happen on Halloween...

name: 1306 Chapter 1: Reactors & Robots
summary: Join 1306, a little reactor maintenance robot, on a terrifying new adventure filled with robotic horrors! Get the rods. Fix the reactor. Prevent the meltdown! Most importantly, don't get disassembled.

name: 13km Deep
summary: You are an employee of U.D.E. Your mission is to explore the ocean depths, investigate ancient artifacts, and... save your own skin. Survive, uncover the corporation's secrets, and find out what lies hidden in the depths.

name: 1348: Ex Voto
summary: Journey through a tumultuous Medieval Italy as Aeta, a young knight errant who sets off on a brutal quest to find and save her closest one. 1348 Ex Voto is a cinematic action-adventure game inspired by chivalric tales.
CONNECTION ESTABLISHED...LOGIN TO 137 NEURAL FRAME DETECTED...CREDENTIALS APPROVED...WELCOME USER

name: 13 AM
summary: An hour-long tower defense game. The clock strikes 13 AM, which means that the Visitors are coming to your house. Place a variety of ghosts to defend yourself and to light up the darkness. Can you survive for one hour?

name: 13 Germinal
summary: A historical and narrative RPG set in the world of Emile Zola's novel. You are a young man in 1885, forced to work deep in the mines to survive. But every day, the work gets harder and the meals get smaller. Organize a strike, reignite the smoldering revolt, and try to change this unjust world.

name: 13 Bones
summary:
You are an unnamed skeleton soldier, a minion among many.
Play 13 BONES (spicy black-jack, with cursed cards) to earn your freedom.

name: 13 Days In Hell
summary:
This is the first of a series of shooting games we are working on.
In this game we worked on the guns feeling and aiming concept.
In the next game, the player will be able to move in a 3D scene.
